Well... it's Counter-Strike but with the source engine. And it's really good. The graphics still hold up, even in 2021 in my opinion. It's the best out of the source games. Way better than Half Life: Source. Give this a try. 10/10

Ill be honest, CSS is better than csgo. Its engine is better, the bhops, the maps, and just the game in general and the look and nostalgia. Ive literately Spent more time on CSS than CSGO when i even downloaded csgo before getting css. the mods and communities make it more funner. i recommend like playing jailbreak mods. Just one thing about this game is that you can get a virus from downloading some map/server/communitygame but thats actually hard to happen.
For those who like to kill nigarssssssssss :steamhappy:

Отличная игра, рекомендую! По факту это та же 1.6 на движке source. Графика в 2021 году для игры 2004 года отличная.
Одна из лучших игр от Valve❤️

Культовая КС с обычным геймплеем для серии Counter-Strike , ходить да всем хедшоты ставить и бомбы закладывать или разминировать их , рассказывать об этой игре что же она из представляет смысла нет , потому огромное кол-во человек знает об этой игре и много людей в неё играли , думаю на этом можно закончить.
очень хорошая игра мне понравилась не зря купил

The newest entry of this series (CS:GO) is a good game, but this is more fun for me. I played CS:GO for 10 hours and thought that it was not for me and then I tried this game and I fell in love with it. 

CS:Source Still has an active player base(At least here in Europe) and I think this game is more fun and less competitive than CS:GO. I think the fun that I have with all the older Counter- Strikes is kinda lost with CS:GO.

_X3
